ul.li1: the number of journeys you made each day
ul.li2: the total cost of the journeys
ul.li3: invoices or receipts showing costs which cover all the journeys you are claiming for

lift.pageTitle: Claiming for lifts from a friend, colleague or family member
lift.h1: Claiming for lifts from a friend, colleague or family member
lift.h1-body: Make sure you have enough information to tell us one of the following:

ul.li1: the total number of journeys each day
ul.li2: the total distance travelled in miles each day
